file_insights.description: Added image preprocessing endpoint with advanced image enhancement capabilities

patterns_discovered: Image preprocessing pipeline with modular functions
Comprehensive error handling in image processing endpoint
Detailed statistical tracking of image transformations
gotchas_discovered: Need for parameter validation in image preprocessing
Importance of handling potential image decoding errors
Potential performance overhead with multiple image transformations

key_achievements: Implemented CLAHE for adaptive contrast enhancement

recommendations: Add unit tests for each image preprocessing function
Consider adding performance profiling for large image sets
Add configuration to disable specific preprocessing steps if needed
